findings.lower_chest: The visualized lung fields are within normal limits. There is no evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion.

abdomen.hepatobiliary: The transplant liver demonstrates homogeneous attenuation throughout. There is no evidence of focal lesions. There is no intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation. The gallbladder is surgically absent.
abdomen.pancreas: The pancreas has normal attenuation throughout, without evidence of focal lesions. There is no pancreatic ductal dilatation and no peripancreatic stranding.
abdomen.spleen: The spleen shows normal size and attenuation throughout.
abdomen.adrenals: The right and left adrenal glands are normal in size and shape.
abdomen.urinary: The kidneys are of normal and symmetric size with no evidence of focal renal lesions, hydronephrosis, nephrolithiasis, or perinephric abnormality.
abdomen.gastrointestinal: The stomach is unremarkable. The small bowel loops demonstrate normal caliber and wall thickness. The colon and rectum are within normal limits. The appendix is normal.
abdomen.pelvis: The urinary bladder and distal ureters are unremarkable. There is no free fluid in the pelvis.
abdomen.reproductive_organs: The prostate and seminal vesicles are normal.
abdomen.lymph_nodes: There is no retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy.
abdomen.vascular: There is no abdominal aortic aneurysm. Mild atherosclerotic disease is noted.
abdomen.bones: There is no evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture. There is mild multilevel degenerative change of the lumbar spine, most pronounced at L5-S1.
abdomen.soft_tissues: The abdominal and pelvic wall is within normal limits.
